div.class: blog-post has-thumb clear post-10680 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-coronavirus category-wsdnews

h2.a: While Wilkinsburg Schools are Closed, Teaching and Learning Continue at Home: New Learn at Home Website Launches April 13

div.div: Posted In: COVID-19, Wilkinsburg School District News

div.p: The COVID-19 Pandemic has closed Wilkinsburg school buildings, but, thanks to a massive effort on the part of district teachers, administrators and staff, learning will continue – in the comfort and safety of students’ homes. On Monday, April 13, the district will launch a new Learn at Home website. Assignments and educational materials for all […]

div.class: blog-post has-thumb post-10625 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-coronavirus category-wsdnews

h2.a: Free Computers & Internet for Qualifying Families and a Parent Technology Survey

div.div: Posted In: COVID-19, Wilkinsburg School District News

div.p: Free Computers The Education Partnership and Computer Reach are collaborating to give families in need a free desktop computer so that students may have the access they need to study at home during the COVID-19 pandemic. An adult family member of your student/s must fill out the Google Form in order to receive the computer. […]

div.class: blog-post has-thumb post-10619 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-coronavirus category-wsdnews tag-covid-19 tag-learn-at-home

h2.a: Learn at Home Materials Now Available for Download!

div.div: Posted In: COVID-19, Wilkinsburg School District News

div.p: To support our District students in their efforts to continue learning during the closure of our District schools for COVID-19, we are happy to offer this single source section of our website for accessing materials by grade level. Please click the link below to download the packet: Pre-K Kindergarten 1st Grade 2nd Grade 3rd Grade […]

div.class: blog-post has-thumb last post-10590 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-coronavirus category-wsdnews

h2.a: Kelly & Turner Families: Take the District Technology Survey! Deadline is April 1

div.div: Posted In: COVID-19, Wilkinsburg School District News

div.p: In an effort to assist Wilkinsburg School District with planning for online instruction, please complete the technology survey linked below by Wednesday, April 1st, 2020. Please complete just one survey per family and only report information pertaining to students currently attending Kelly Primary or Turner Intermediate Schools. https://wbsd.page.link/srv

div.class: blog-post has-thumb clear post-10585 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-coronavirus category-wsdnews

div.div: Posted In: COVID-19, Wilkinsburg School District News

div.p: Dear Wilkinsburg School District Families and Members of the Community, Yesterday afternoon, Governor Wolf and the Pennsylvania Department of Education (PDE) announced that all school buildings in the commonwealth will remain closed through at least April 6th as a result of the COVID-19 response efforts. If that time frame stands, students would return to school […]

div.class: blog-post has-thumb post-10547 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-coronavirus category-wsdnews

h2.a: Log In and Learn with Scholastic Learn at Home!

div.div: Posted In: COVID-19, Wilkinsburg School District News

div.p: Help your children stay actively engaged in learning while school is closed! The Scholastic Learn At Home website below provides all students with 20 days’ worth of learning journeys that span the content areas. This is voluntary. The Wilkinsburg School District wanted to provide one source for our families go to during this time. The Scholastic Learn At Home website […]

div.class: blog-post has-thumb post-10528 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-coronavirus category-wsdnews tag-board-meeting

h2.a: Please Note: Our March 24 School Board Meeting Will be a Virtual Meeting!

div.div: Posted In: COVID-19, Wilkinsburg School District News

div.p: Meeting Details: Legislative meeting time is March 24, at 7 pm. Log In Details: Meeting ID: meet.google.com/zea-mcat-qur Phone Numbers 260-297-0154‬ PIN: ‪605 062 099#‬

div.span:

718 Wallace Avenue
Pittsburgh, PA 15221
Phone: 412-371-9667

span.a: Yes, your kids can celebrate Earth Day at home! Here are some ways to do so!

h3.a: Looking for the Best Earth Day Activities? Here Are 15 Fun Ways to Celebrate Earth Day

div.span: Earth Day—which is on April 22, 2020—is celebrating its 50th anniversary this year, and the annual recognition of our planet has come a long way since its beginnings in 1970!The celebration of Ear...

span.a: A big “GREAT JOB” goes out to Christian Joyner in Ms. Gaydos’ 3rd grade class! In the past 30 days Christian has spent 7 hours 51 mins and answered 985 questions on IXL! Keep up the super work, Christian!!
